transcript:
Customer: Actually part mera hai.
Executive: 65 hai na aapka?
Customer: 65.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Haan sir main Diya bol rahi hu IndiaMART head office se unhone aapko call kiya tha na Ravi Gupta ne?
Customer: Haan wo problem solve nahi hui.
Executive: Haan haan baat bhi meri unse ki wo fir se OTP wagera aa raha tha hai na?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To ye fir kal discuss hoga na sir?
Customer: Haan unhone kaha hai main kuch kar raha hu wo kal se pata chalega aisa bol rahe the wo.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Kal discuss hoga.
Executive: Chaliye theek hai sir kal isko turant matlab jitna jaldi se jaldi ho paye karte hain.
Customer: Main to baitha hi tha ek ghanta ho gaya ab aapke yahan se solution nahi nikal raha hai to kya karenge.
Executive: Nahi maine pehle aapko call kiya aapka receive nahi hua fir maine Ravi ko wapas call kiya unhone bola ki mam kuch na uska issue aa raha hai matlab generally aisa nahi hota hai dobara OTP nahi aata hai lekin ye wali case mein unke pe aa raha hai aur jis tarike se wo bol rahe hain us tarike se wo follow bhi nahi ho pa raha hai exact the way to uska bhi kuch issue hai.
Customer: Aapko kuch bhi nahi karna hai unke yahan pe aapke jo unko nahi hai itna knowledge ya to jo meri jo ID hai admin wali wo kaun handle karta hai usko sirf itna bolna hai ki meri do ID do ID to meri login ho chuki hai sales wali aur director wali purchase aur info wale ko reset karna hai bas abhi tak koi bhi ID reset hui nahi hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Purchase wali aur info wali ko reset karna hai to wo automatically reset ho jayegi main login kar dunga.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Haan to wo reset hone ke baad login karne pe bhi to OTP chahiye hoga?
Customer: Uske liye to OTP nahi jo purana password hai wo hoga jo meri ke sath aaya tha.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To OTP ka to OTP ka to case hi nahi hona chahiye na mujhe meri ID ke password yaad hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Wo password se login hona chahiye password dalne ke baad bhi wo OTP mang raha hai.
Executive: Unhone bhi yahi bola ki dobara OTP nahi aana chahiye but wo for some reason kuch technical wagera jo bhi hai bar bar OTP aa raha hai.
Customer: Technical reason hai aapke IndiaMART yahan pe ye jo hoga jo bhi hoga uske through hai na.
Executive: Haan bilkul bilkul sir abhi isliye matlab isme hum to nahi kar sakte backend team hi jo bhi mujhe Ravi ne bola ki kal jo hai wo apne manager se aapka ispe detail discussion matlab cheeze isko solve karane ki puri koshish karenge ki aapka jo credentials hai mail ID hai wo sari ki sari login ho jaye.
Customer: Haan wo abhi mera to abhi kuch concern clear hua nahi hai aur meri taraf se koi usme dikkat nahi hai wo aapki backend team kya kar rahi hai kaise kar rahi hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: Bilkul sir hum usko bhi dekhenge aisa nahi hai ki sirf aisa hi hoga ki aapka issue resolve nahi hoga definitely isko jo bhi required cheeze hain wo hongi hi hongi.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Bas ye hai ki ha thoda sa time lag raha hai usme ye hai.
Customer: Time to dekhiye mere ko issue nahi hai time ka aap bol rahe hain jaldi se solve ho jaye to solve ho to main kuch aage baat karu.
Executive: Sir bilkul bilkul bilkul wo baat to honi hi chahiye solve hona chahiye sir ek cheez aap mujhe bataye haan haan ye jo aapki dealing hai food colors mein to food color kaun sa synthetic natural liquid kaun sa wala food color hai aapka?
Customer: Sare food color hai mere.
Executive: Sare hain?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Achcha all type of food colors mein aapka dealing hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai aur haan aur iske alava bhi ek aisi bhi category hai jaise main aapko bata deti hu ye wali kubot achcha aapne mujhe nahi sorry aapne mujhe wo bataya hua tha sir aapki profile pe yahan pe kuch jo categories ki wo profile pe cheeze pending thi aapne kaha tha images photos wo sab bhi aap add kara lenge properly jab aapka ye sab ho jayega.
Customer: Haan wo dheere dheere wo mail wagera sahi ho to main mail pe mangaunga aur fir photo update karunga.
Executive: Achcha koi aur bhejega kya?
Customer: Haan jahan se apan purchase karte hain to godown se aayenge na sare photos wagera to.
Executive: Achcha achcha achcha achcha godown okay okay aur account to aapke alava koi aur nahi use karta hai ya aap hi sirf karte hain?
Customer: Nahi nahi koi nahi.
Executive: Okay sir calls wagera bhi kuch missed ho rahi hai call back ho jata hai but usse bhi thoda sa kuch hai aur rating se views waise to aapke kafi achche hain 96 users ne de rakha hai 4.8 ki rating hai which is very good to aap bolte hain customers ko ya ye organically hai sir?
Customer: Nahi ye to.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Achcha achcha achcha okay aur to kuch aisa issue nahi hai sir services ke regarding ye mail ID ke alava?
Customer: Nahi mail ID ke alava kuch bhi nahi.
Executive: Achcha achcha achcha theek hai sir fir kal aapko jo hai Ravi main ek bar wapas inhe subah message kar dungi ki wo jaldi hi aapko call karke ye cheeze sahi kara de theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai okay.
Executive: Okay sir thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is facing OTP issues during login.

- Customer needs purchase and info IDs reset.

- Wants resolution for mail and login issues.



Resolution:

- Executive acknowledged the OTP issue.

- Assured the customer of a follow-up call.

- Executive will inform Ravi to call customer.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will message Ravi to call customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- otp, login, mail id, reset, password
